name: John McFarlane
description: Like fishing,car shows,crafts,animals,my native culture,family, warm weather,football,movies,music,b omb fires,sunsets. I’m a passionate,loving,man with old fashion morals. Affectionate,like to cuddle,hold hands,like seeing new things,I love life and enjoy the simple things. I’m honest,loyal,faithful,caring and have a big loving heart. but it doesn’t stop me from from living and there is so much more to know about me if someone would just take the time. Any questions just ask, I will answer honestly so don’t be afraid to ask. but I still have all the desires and needs as a man to live a full and normal physical life of love. I have a good sense of humor and like to laugh, I love wolves and I am spiritual, easy going,down to earth. I have a 38 year old daughter and she is married . If there’s something you would like to know,please just ask.
